course_description: This course will cover quantitative models for stock selection. Students will use data from financial statements, stock prices, and trading volume to develop quantitative models for profitable stock investments. Students will get hands-on experience in building models that best suit their investment horizons.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the MAF program.
sections: Class Nbr: 5030, Section #: 4201, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: N. Jegadeesh, Status: Open
